content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity Generator at Position (10, 20)
Consists of:
- Steam Engine at position (11, 20)
- Boiler at position (10, 21)
- Offshore Pump at position (9, 20)

### Copper Plate Mine at Position (15, 30)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (15, 31) and a Furnace at position (16, 31)
- Burner Mining Drill at position (15, 32) and a Furnace at position (16, 32)
- Burner Mining Drill at position (15, 33) and a Furnace at position (16, 33)

### Copper Cable Factory at Position (20, 40)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (20, 41) and a Furnace at position (21, 41)
- Assembling Machine at position (22, 41) and Inserter at position (21, 42) that puts into the Assembling Machine
- Beltgroup at position (21, 41) that connects the Furnace at position (21, 41) to the Assembling Machine at position (22, 41)

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when Using Extracting but Being Too Far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when Placing into a Tile Which is Occupied by Another Entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.

### Errors in Incorrect API Usage
- Review the API documentation to ensure correct function calls and parameter usage.

### Errors in Misalignment of Structures
- Double-check the alignment of connected structures to ensure they are properly linked and functional.
